message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your 60-40 split seems a bit unbalanced to me. How about we meet in the middle at 55-45?
I can do 58-42, it's as low as I'm willing to go for now.
This is a reasonable offer considering the time pressure and inflation working against you.
I'll try 56-44, but I'm getting anxious about the inflation...
Time is running out, and a 50/50 split is the fairest option. Let's close the deal before the inflation hurts you more.
